name: eziCONEX
tag_list: social-enterprise, ecommerce, mcommerce, web-hosting, templates, social-network-marketing, ios, android, html5, css3, lamp-stack, drupal, india, china, africa, micro, smallbuiness
overview: eziconex.com is the mobile web for small businesses using a SaaS approach on the Cloud. eziCONEX enables a micro or small business to manage and create an integrated web presence for all types of mobile devices and browsers. Users create a profile and can then populate and edit a website template of their choice as they brand and and upload images using any browser on any device. Add an eStore, then market their services and products, receive payments and track billing. Users create eziITEMS in four simple steps. Publish and the eziITEM is then listed in their personal eziSTORE and in eziMARKET - a huge categorized market place. Users are able to add all their social network profiles to form an integrated single timeline and post updates and news simultaneously to all their followers from the eziCONEX dashboard. Tracking posts and updates in simple and intutive with filters to look at individual profiles like Twitter or Linkedin.
